message: Let's split close to even, but slightly in my favor to account for inflation over the next few rounds.  It's better to settle early than lose money!
I'll take a bit more, considering you lose more from inflation
I'm willing to split it evenly now, Bob.  Another round and the inflation will just hurt us both. Let's be fair.
Inflation hurts you more, so I'll take a bigger share
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. I'm taking a hit from inflation, and this offer ensures we both get something. If you reject this, I'm likely to accept a worse offer in later rounds.
You're losing value every round, I'll take more
